sense.def:
Z izrazom
usual
opišemo stvar, ki se v določenih okoliščinah zgodi ali uporablja najpogosteje.

seg.quote: He sat in his usual chair.
She got up earlier than usual.

sense.def:
Izraz
as usual
pove, da opisujemo nekaj, kar se običajno dogaja ali je običajno res.

seg.quote: As usual, he spent the night at home.
She had to try and carry on as usual.
